class.name: GameplayCue
class.brief_description: A resource that defines visual and audio feedback for gameplay events.
class.description: [GameplayCue] resources are "Data" that describe WHAT should happen visually/audibly (VFX, SFX, Animation) when a specific event occurs. They are executed by the [AbilitySystemComponent].

method.name: _execute_cue
method.description: Override this method to implement custom logic (e.g., spawn particles, play sound) in GDScript.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes the cue logic (GDScript override). The visual/audio properties are handled automatically by the system (Spec).

members.member: Name of the animation to play on the sibling AnimationPlayer.
Intensity of camera shake (if supported by camera system).
Tag identifying this cue (for lookup or networking).
PackedScene (VFX) to instantiate at the location.
